allow: Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:3004/api/admin/categories/migrate -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3004/api/auth/login -H Content-Type:' "application/json -d ''''{username:admin,password:admin123}'''' | grep -o ''''accessToken:[^]* | cut -d'''' -f4)")
